title: Navigation Menu
desc: Navigation menu is the list of links that the user can always access.
usage_1: Which contains the main functions links. A main function navigation can have sub-navigation items by using a hierarchy style.
usage_2: Icons in the navigation bar serve as a visual affordance that indicates the item is actionable. For example, when hovering a navigation item, it will appear lighter blue color as the background.
usage_3: If a navigation item is a group, it does not have the function to access other pages. Only can expand or collapse the navigation item group.
sub_long: Sub nav item1 with long long title long long title long long title long long title long long title title long long title long long
collapse_desc: The navigation menu is always collapsed.
